content: अलोक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not having space (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--2@} That which cannot be seen, as in लोकालोक इवाचलः <ls>R. 1. 68</ls> (न लोक्यत इत्यलोकः <ls>Malli.</ls>); see लोकालोक also. {@--3@} Having no people. {@--4@} One who does not go to any other world after death (not having performed meritorious deeds). --कः, --कं {@--1@} Not the world. {@--2@} End or destruction of the world; absence of people; रक्ष सर्वानिमाल्लोँकान् नालोकं कर्तुमर्हसिं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--3@} The immaterial or spiritual world. {@--4@} The nether world (पाताल). {@--5@} A {%Ṛtvij%} or any such priest. {@--6@} One who is not a seer or observer. --का A kind of bird.
